member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.CommandLineUtils.ArgumentEscaper
member.summary: A utility for escaping arguments for new processes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.CommandLineUtils.ArgumentEscaper.EscapeAndConcatenate(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Undo the processing which took place to create string[] args in Main, so that the next process will receive the same string[] args.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.CommandLineUtils.DotNetMuxer
member.summary: Utilities for finding the "dotnet.exe" file from the currently running .NET Core application

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.CommandLineUtils.DotNetMuxer.MuxerPath
member.summary: The full filepath to the .NET Core muxer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.CommandLineUtils.DotNetMuxer.MuxerPathOrDefault
member.summary: Finds the full filepath to the .NET Core muxer, or returns a string containing the default name of the .NET Core muxer ('dotnet').
member.returns: The path or a string named 'dotnet'.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.AppDesc
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Code generation for Asp.net Core.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.ConfigurationOptionDesc
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Configuration for the project (Possible values: Debug/ Release).

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.ConnectToServerError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not connect to port {0}..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.EnableTracingMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to To see more information, enable tracing by setting environment variable 'codegen_trace' = 1..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.FileSystemChangeMessageNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Server does not support File System change messages. HostId: '{0}', ProtocolVersion: '{1}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.GenericErrorMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Scaffolding failed..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.ProjectInformationError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not get ProjectInformation..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.ProjectPathOptionDesc
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Path to .csproj file in the project..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.RunWithoutSimulationMode
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Please run scaffolding without --simulation-mode switch.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.SimulationModeOptionDesc
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specifies whether to persist any file changes..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design.Resources.TargetFrameworkOptionDesc
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Target Framework to use. (Short folder name of the tfm. eg. net46).
